FuncDef: This command configures the action to take when LSP BFD fails on an RSVP LSP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the LSP will be marked as unusable in the TTM. If it appears as a shortcut in RTM, then the route will be removed.

Specifies that the active path of an RSVP LSP will switch to the secondary path or next-preference available secondary path. This option is only available for RSVP LSPs. It is not applicable in the LSP template.
